column4: i don't want to sound rude, but please read everything i said before you comment
there is nothing wrong with the unrar process
i simply don't know WHERe it unrared at on my Os drive
and it didn't unrasr in the location of the archive
look, i had 2 gb left on my Os drive i  unrared the file and it couldn't finish ebacuse it ran out of space and my OS drive has 0 space left
so how do i find these files?
do a file list on the archive
are you on a live cd?
You said that they were all in the /home/ directory, right?
with the 'mount' command, though if you are talking about making your entire filesystem writeable without sudo... that's not a good idea
sounds like there may be some problems due to the Os drive filling up...
so you're still getting the 'cannot access parent directories' error?
